duties_responsibilities.duty: Achieve Budgeted Net Sales and Direct Contribution for the store.
Provide exceptional customer experience and embrace the brand positioning.
Develop and maintain a strong, dynamic store team through recruitment and training.
Demonstrate high level of business acumen and protect the assets of the store.
Deliver business results by achieving or exceeding Direct Contribution & Budgeted Net Sales.
Educate and reinforce the brand's lifestyle and selling culture, and maintain an upbeat store atmosphere.
Lead and uphold the Core Values and Core Leadership Qualities, inspire and empower the team, and manage in the moment.
Ensure operational excellence by maintaining inventory, optimizing store functionality, and compliance with retail store policies.
